tasks.label: 编译 C++ Golden (全部)
args: PYTHON=${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/python && INCLUDES=$($PYTHON -m pybind11 --includes) && SUFFIX=$($PYTHON -c "import sysconfig; print(sysconfig.get_config_var('EXT_SUFFIX'))") && echo '=== 编译 CPU Golden ===' && cd ${workspaceFolder}/aidevtools/golden/cpp && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j$(sysctl -n hw.ncpu) && cp cpu_golden cpu_golden_bfp ../.. && echo '=== 编译 BFP Golden ===' && cd ${workspaceFolder}/aidevtools/formats/custom/bfp/cpp && c++ -O3 -Wall -shared -std=c++17 -undefined dynamic_lookup $INCLUDES bfp.cpp bfp_pybind.cpp -o ../bfp_golden$SUFFIX && echo '=== 编译 GFloat Golden ===' && cd ${workspaceFolder}/aidevtools/formats/custom/gfloat/cpp && c++ -O3 -Wall -shared -std=c++17 -undefined dynamic_lookup $INCLUDES gfloat.cpp gfloat_pybind.cpp -o ../gfloat_golden$SUFFIX && echo '=== 编译完成 ==='
